paper.title: CLUSTERING ROMANIAN STOCK FUNDS BY RETURN AND RISK
paper.abstract: Mutual funds are classified at an international level, according to specific criteria, by the rating agencies, and the results are presented in a simple form. Morningstar groups the funds with the help of a system of stars indicating the performance of the funds during different periods. This classification does not apply to Romanian mutual funds. The Romanian Association of Asset Managers publishes only information about risk and return. In this paper, we used cluster analysis (hierarchical classification) and the AT-GARCH model in order to classify the mutual stock funds in Romania. The variables taken into consideration for the cluster analysis are represented by minimum constant risk, time-varying standard risk, turmoil risk and average of the returns. The estimation of the components risk will enable us to take into account the stochastic nature of the financial time series. The classification thus obtained is useful for the investors who want to diversify their investments via the purchase of units of mutual stock funds that have a different market behavior from the perspective of return and risk.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究通过聚类分析和AT-GARCH模型对罗马尼亚股票基金进行分类，考虑风险和回报的不同维度，目的是帮助投资者通过购买不同市场行为的基金单位来分散投资，这属于投资组合管理的范畴。
